articles.description: Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi's trip to Africa this week made it no clearer when Africans can expect to receive a Chinese vaccine -- or on what terms.

articles.title: Opinion: The US Capitol attack has left an indelible mark on our national security

articles.title: An injured bald eagle entangled in fishing line was rescued by two children and some Florida firefighters
articles.description: Firefighters in Florida this week helped rescue a bald eagle with a fishing hook stuck in its beak and the attached line wrapped around its wing and beak.

articles.title: Trump considering Giuliani and Dershowitz for impeachment defense team
articles.description: Staring down the barrel of a second impeachment, President Donald Trump is beginning to mull who would represent him in a Senate trial.

articles.title: CEO arrested for breaching the US Capitol during Trump-fueled insurrection

articles.title: Illinois Republican congresswoman apologizes for invoking Hitler as she faces calls to resign
articles.description: Republican US Rep. Mary Miller of Illinois issued an apology Friday after invoking Adolf Hitler during a speech earlier in the week -- comments that have been widely condemned and have some Illinois Democrats calling for her resignation.
